Name: Suresh Raina
Teams: India, Chennai Super Kings, India Blue, India U19, Board Presidents XI, Uttar Pradesh, India A, Rest of India, Central Zone, Indians, Gujarat Lions, India Green, India C
Bio: Suresh Raina represented the new-age Indian cricketer: An attacking left-her who went for the big shots with impunity  cleared the field with a flourish when at the top of his game,he was also an electric fielder in the circle,was tempered with an iffy technique against the short ball,which was exploited mercilessly in Test cricket  meant Raina's Test career never reached the heights his limited-overs career did,despite starting promisingly
